data: {"concept_id": "body_logic", "concept_name": "Character Body Logic", "type": "element", "definition": "How a character’s body moves and occupies space—posture, gesture, breath, gaze, pace—revealing inner state, history, and relationships in the moment.", "scope_notes": "Dynamic and context-dependent; dials from Low→Medium→High strength. Use to show rather than tell; evolve across arcs.", "axes": "channel|strength", "axis_values": "posture|gesture|gaze|hands|breath_phys|space_use|reactivity | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "dialogue|beats|subtext|tension|setting", "conflicts_with": "cliche_gestures|floating_choreography|mismatch|over_description|inconsistency", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_body_logic_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_body_logic_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_posture_baseline", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "posture", "description": "Baseline carriage shifts under pressure (tall/compact, open/closed).", "detection_hint": "Spine, shoulders, head tilt words; transitions within scene.", "false_positive_risks": "Reading social status from posture alone; cultural variance.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_gesture_specific", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "gesture", "description": "Specific, repeatable gestures tied to motive/history.", "detection_hint": "Named habits with context: ring twist, sleeve roll, frame straightening.", "false_positive_risks": "Generic filler (‘she fidgets’) with no link.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_gaze_scope", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "gaze", "description": "Eye behavior signals attention, avoidance, threat, attraction.", "detection_hint": "Holds, flicks, flinches, triangulation; avoids/locks.", "false_positive_risks": "‘He looked’ with no function.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_hands_tell", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "hands", "description": "Hands leak truth: tremor, grip, micro-movements.", "detection_hint": "Object interaction (cup, keys, photo) with intent.", "false_positive_risks": "Random prop fidget with no payoff.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_breath_phys", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "breath_phys", "description": "Breath and physiological tells modulate tension.", "detection_hint": "Hitch, shallow, held, cadence shifts, sweat, swallow.", "false_positive_risks": "Medicalized detail that derails tone.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_space_use", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "space_use", "description": "Use of space/proximity defines power and relationship.", "detection_hint": "Enter, encroach, retreat, block, mirror; seat choice.", "false_positive_risks": "Stagey blocking divorced from POV.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_reactivity_tempo", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "reactivity", "description": "Timing/tempo: beats land faster/slower with pressure.", "detection_hint": "Pause, overlap, interruption; yes‑but / no‑and cadence.", "false_positive_risks": "Same tempo regardless of stakes.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_strength_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Bare gesture or vague label; thin link to emotion/context.", "detection_hint": "One small cue; placeholder usable on draft.", "false_positive_risks": "Feels like checkbox detail; cliché.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_strength_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Clear, specific cues integrated with dialogue/action.", "detection_hint": "2–3 cues spaced; supports subtext.", "false_positive_risks": "Overuse that stalls pacing.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_strength_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Layered, evolving physicality under pressure; contradicts or amplifies words; marks turning point.", "detection_hint": "Cues change within scene; consequence or reframe.", "false_positive_risks": "Purple choreography without causality.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_pattern_mirror", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Mirror emotion with body for clarity.", "detection_hint": "Match intensity to mood; anchor beats.", "false_positive_risks": "One-note mirroring with no nuance.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_pattern_contrast", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Contrast body vs words for subtext.", "detection_hint": "Calm voice, tense fists; steady voice with tremor.", "false_positive_risks": "Random mismatch that confuses stakes.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_pattern_escalate", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Escalate cues as stakes rise; de-escalate for breath.", "detection_hint": "Introduce more specific/layered cues.", "false_positive_risks": "Escalation without scene pressure.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_pattern_embed_env", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Embed body logic in setting/objects.", "detection_hint": "Use space, props, temperature to shape movement.", "false_positive_risks": "Floating gestures detached from place.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_pattern_signature", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Give characters signature tells that evolve.", "detection_hint": "Unique, motive‑linked habits; break them at turning points.", "false_positive_risks": "Quirks with no payoffs.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "signal_id": "sig_pattern_foreshadow", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "", "description": "Use recurring physical cue to foreshadow/recall.", "detection_hint": "Echo a gesture before reveal; callback after.", "false_positive_risks": "Unpaid foreshadow gesturing.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "misconception_id": "cliche_gestures", "description": "Cliché stack (eye roll, shrug, lip bite) used generically.", "tells": "Repeats with no specificity or motive.", "likely_causes": "Defaulting to stock moves.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie choices to history/goal; refresh the image.", "micro_drill": "Replace 3 clichés with character‑specific tells.", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "misconception_id": "floating_choreography", "description": "Movements read like stage directions, not POV.", "tells": "List of moves; no consequence.", "likely_causes": "Camera‑first drafting.", "corrective_feedback": "Embed in cause/effect and stakes.", "micro_drill": "Cut to 2 beats that change something.", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "misconception_id": "mismatch", "description": "Body signals don’t match scene tone or arc.", "tells": "Random calm in panic; melodrama in quiet scene.", "likely_causes": "Chasing variety over truth.", "corrective_feedback": "Mirror or purposeful contrast tied to stakes.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite with either mirror or meaningful contrast.", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "misconception_id": "over_description", "description": "Too many cues stall pacing; micromanaged limbs.", "tells": "Every breath/step logged.", "likely_causes": "Fear of reader confusion.", "corrective_feedback": "Select telling details; let inference carry rest.", "micro_drill": "Compress 5 gestures into 2 telling beats.", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"concept_id": "body_logic", "misconception_id": "inconsistency", "description": "Signature tells jump around or vanish.", "tells": "Lost continuity across scenes.", "likely_causes": "No tracking of physical arc.", "corrective_feedback": "Track baseline and shifts at beats.", "micro_drill": "Map baseline→pressure→shift for one chapter.", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_body_logic_identify_channel_strength", "concept_id": "body_logic", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each line by channel (posture/gesture/gaze/hands/breath_phys/space_use/reactivity) and strength (low/med/high). Justify with one cue.", "expected_features": "Correct channel+strength; cites evidence; ties to stakes.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels + precise evidence + stakes link", "Meets": "Mostly accurate; basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels/evidence off"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include decorative gestures as traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Name cue 2) Choose channel 3) Decide strength", "variation_axes": "channel|strength", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_body_logic_contrast_words_body", "concept_id": "body_logic", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Given dialogue+movement, mark where body contradicts words and explain the subtext.", "expected_features": "Identifies contrast; infers plausible motive.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Subtext inference sharp and grounded", "Meets": "Reasonable inference", "Developing": "Ungrounded/obvious only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Lines with accidental mismatch.", "hint_steps": "1) Underline words 2) Circle cues 3) State the subtext", "variation_axes": "stakes|relationship", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_body_logic_escalate", "concept_id": "body_logic", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Take a low-strength cue and escalate it to medium then high without adding melodrama.", "expected_features": "Adds specificity, layering, consequence.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear Low→Med→High ladder tied to pressure", "Meets": "Some escalation; partial tie", "Developing": "Bigger adjectives only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Tempt adjective inflation.", "hint_steps": "1) Add specific cue 2) Tie to object/space 3) Add effect", "variation_axes": "pressure|deadline", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_body_logic_embed_in_scene", "concept_id": "body_logic", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Fix floating choreography by embedding movement into setting and cause/effect.", "expected_features": "Gestures interact with objects/space; change something.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Each fix affects beat/space", "Meets": "Some interaction", "Developing": "Still floaty"}, "distractor_strategy": "Non‑interactive motion list.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose prop/space 2) Create small change 3) Land consequence", "variation_axes": "setting|props", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_body_logic_1", "concept_id": "body_logic", "axis_value": "gesture|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "She rolls the ring once, twice, then pockets it.", "context_tags": "hands|decision", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_body_logic_2", "concept_id": "body_logic", "axis_value": "posture|high", "label": "strong", "text": "His shoulders square as the verdict lands; he keeps his seat.", "context_tags": "court|resolve", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_body_logic_3", "concept_id": "body_logic", "axis_value": "space_use|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He steps closer until the table edge touches his hip.", "context_tags": "pressure|power", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_body_logic_4", "concept_id": "body_logic", "axis_value": "breath_phys|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Her breath saws short; words come even and level.", "context_tags": "contrast|mask", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_body_logic_5", "concept_id": "body_logic", "axis_value": "gaze|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "She keeps her eyes on the door, not the doorframe where his coat used to hang.", "context_tags": "grief|avoidance", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_body_logic_weak_1", "concept_id": "body_logic", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "She was nervous and fidgeted.", "context_tags": "label|cliche", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_body_logic_weak_2", "concept_id": "body_logic", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "He looked angry.", "context_tags": "label|generic", "source_file": "Character Body Logic.md", "source_md5": "8a87fe149ae96138ab1d5d457345e6ce", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:18:43.749566Z"}
